```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("tidyverse")
```


```{r}
data1 = read.csv("full_10confs_1500iters.csv")
data2 = read.csv("full_10confs_2000iters.csv")
data3 = read.csv("full_15confs_1500iters.csv")
data4 = read.csv("full_15confs_2000iters.csv")
data5 = read.csv("full_5confs_1500iters.csv")
data6 = read.csv("full_5confs_2000iters.csv")
```

```{r}
fulldata=full_join(data1,data2)%>%full_join(data3)%>%full_join(data4)%>%full_join(data5)%>%full_join(data6)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data=fulldata,aes(N,LogP.SA, col=as.factor(confs)))+geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data=fulldata,aes(N,LogP.SA, col=as.factor(iters)))+geom_point()
```
